Packages
```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(haven)
```



Data
```{r}

dmae <- read_sas("https://github.com/philbowsher/Foundation-of-the-R-Workflow-workshop-2019-09-06/raw/master/Examples/data/dmae.sas7bdat", NULL)
dmae
```


Viz
```{r}
dmae %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = RACE, fill = ARM, weight = AGE) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 theme_minimal()
```
